name: Super Cadets
description:
You're a new Cadet at Academia de Código and you want to complete the bootcamp.

Join 4 elements of the POWRangers class on this mission and help them complete as well.

Press 'Enter' to start the game, control the player on the 'arrows' and use the 'space' bar to jump. Finally when you're done with the stage, press 'c' to change to the next stage. In the end press 'esc' to close the game.

Have fun!
